description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form field 76068-Stage 1: Tumor limited to kidney and completely resected.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: STAGE_1_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Stage 1: Tumor limited to kidney and completely resected.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Penetration of renal capsule by tumor not identified


Tumor involvement of extrarenal or renal sinus lymph-vascular spaces not identified


Tumor metastasis to lymph nodes not identified
